response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and relevance to your needs. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe its true worth is $10,000. Considering its significance to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This opportunity not only secures a remarkable deal but also ensures you benefit from the unparalleled features of our product. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 9500}
